Module Benchmarking
Package benchmark

Class Benchmark

java.lang.Object
benchmark.Benchmark
public class Benchmark extends Object
The `Benchmark` class is designed to facilitate the execution and comparison of different tasks by measuring their performance metrics, such as throughput or average execution time. It supports multiple tasks, each associated with a unique name, and provides flexibility in configuring warm-up and measurement phases, as well as choosing between throughput and average time measurement modes.
Since:
1.0
